element.name: Blade of the Eternal Tempest
element.description:
Weapon (longsword), Legendary (requires attunement)

Forged from the very essence of a raging storm, this longsword crackles with arcs of lightning. The blade hums with tempest energy, glowing with a calm blue radiance.

Storm Fury. This weapon grants a +3 bonus to attack and damage rolls. On a hit, it deals an additional 3d8 lightning damage.

While attuned, you gain resistance to lightning and thunder damage.

Call the Tempest (1/Long Rest). You can cast Call Lightning at 9th level without expending a spell slot.

Attunement Ritual. To attune, the wielder must endure a lightning strike during a storm and succeed on a DC 18 Constitution saving throw. Upon success, the blade binds to its wielder.
